change.content: changed parameter check for mq send receive.
R_OSAL_MqSendUntilTimeStamp, R_OSAL_MqSendForTimePeriod, R_OSAL_MqReceiveUntilTimeStamp and R_OSAL_MqReceiveForTimePeriod
Changed API definition.
Replaced OSAL_RETURN_PERMITTED to OSAL_RETURN_PROHIBITED
Removed OSAL_RETURN_CANCELED
Fixed OSAL types definition.
char* task_name -> const char* task_name in st_osal_thread_config_t
Updated function argument description.
R_OSAL_PmSetPostClock(): Argument range: 0 <= clock_divider < 64
Added a note about 64-byte boundaries to match ARM's cache size.
R_OSAL_MmngrAlloc(alignment, size), R_OSAL_MmngrFlush(alignment, size), R_OSAL_MmngrInvalidate(alignment, size)

Updated applyImmediate description.

Fixed to maintain consistency with the xOS1 development.
